player.name: Scottie Pippen
player.jerseyDescription: red and black basketball jersey with white trim, no logos
player.physicalDescription: SCOTTIE PIPPEN LIKENESS: tall (6'8") and lean athletic build, distinctive long face with prominent nose and chin, 1990s style high-top fade haircut, calm cool expression, dark skin
player.archetype: The Ultimate Sidekick, criminally underrated, two-way excellence

figure.name: Aaron
figure.attributeDescription: golden staff of the high priest, elaborate breastplate with 12 precious stones representing the 12 tribes of Israel
figure.visualStyle: dignified High Priest of Israel, biblical
figure.clothing: HIGH PRIEST VESTMENTS: blue robe (me'il) with golden bells and pomegranates at hem, ephod (apron) of gold/blue/purple/scarlet with onyx shoulder stones, jeweled breastplate (choshen) with 12 gemstones in 4 rows, white linen turban with golden crown plate inscribed 'Holy to the Lord'
figure.physicalDescription: tall dignified elderly man, long flowing white beard, wise serene expression
figure.anatomyNote: two arms only, one may hold staff
figure.archetype: The High Priest, Moses's essential partner, spoke for the leader

connection.thematic: Both were the essential partners who made greatness possible, often overlooked
connection.narrative: Scottie and Aaron: Elite support, criminally underrated. Some things never change.
connection.relationship: The indispensable right-hand who made the leader complete

interactions.description: Back-to-back with their leaders' silhouettes in the background
Pippen passing, Aaron gesturing to speak, both in service
Standing together as equals, finally getting their due
